labPackage

Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • labPackage.Navigation

  • public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    allows simplified and organized control of robot's main driving motors.
    Author:
    Ivan, Nate, Mike

      • setSpeeds

        public void setSpeeds(float lSpd,
                      float rSpd)
        Set the motor speeds jointly, with floats, and start rotating indefinitely
        Parameters:
        float - lSpd the speed at which the left wheel should turn, in deg per second
        float - rSpd the speed at which the right wheel should turn, in deg per second

      • setSpeeds

        public void setSpeeds(int lSpd,
                      int rSpd)
        Set the motor speeds jointly, with integers, and start rotating indefinitely
        Parameters:
        float - lSpd the speed at which the left wheel should turn, in deg per second
        float - rSpd the speed at which the right wheel should turn, in deg per second

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(double x,
                     double y,
                     boolean unneccessaryBool)
        TravelTo function which takes as arguments the x and y position in cm will travel to designated position, while constantly updating its heading
        Parameters:
        double - x: x coordinate of destination
        double - y: y coordinate of destination
        boolean - unnecessaryBool: enter true

        Parameters:

        stop - stop turning when angle is reached if true

      • turnToNoError

        public void turnToNoError(double angle,
                          boolean stop)
        TurnTo with no error, as in it's supposed to turn slower for no wheel slip, it is basically the same as TurnTo
        Parameters:
        angle - the direction to turn towards
        stop - stop turning when angle is reached if true

        public void goForwardSpeed(double distance,

        speed - int. speed at which wheels should rotate, in deg per second

      • setRotationSpeed

        public void setRotationSpeed(float speed)
        set speed of wheels, in deg per second, to passed value for rover rotation ccw. sets left wheel to speed and right wheel to -speed
        Parameters:
        speed - float. the speed at which wheels should rotate, in deg per second

        public void travelToSimple(double x,

        y - y coordinate of destination
